effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Envenom, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Envenom, Rupture, and Crimson Tempest have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!
Set: When you would lose  Winning Streak!, you have a chance to instead gain maximum stacks of  Winning Streak! for 4s. These cannot be removed and have 50% additional effect while immune to removal.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Agility by 2,290, up to 11,451.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2.4 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 4,211 or your lowest secondary stat by 5,313 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 168,867 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
